00087 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00088 #include "config.h"
00089 #endif

00091 #ifdef _SOLARIS
00092 #include "solaris_port.h"
00093 #endif /* _SOLARIS */
00094 
00095 #include "LRU_List.h"
00096 #include "log_functions.h"
00097 #include "HashData.h"
00098 #include "HashTable.h"
00099 #include "fsal.h"
00100 #include "cache_inode.h"
00101 #include "cache_content.h"
00102 
00103 #include <unistd.h>
00104 #include <sys/types.h>
00105 #include <sys/param.h>
00106 #include <time.h>
00107 #include <pthread.h>
00108 #include <errno.h>
00109 #include <dirent.h>
00110 #include <string.h>
00111 
00122 cache_content_status_t cache_content_crash_recover( unsigned short               exportid,
00123                                                     unsigned int                 index,
00124                                                     unsigned int                 mod,
00125                                                     cache_content_client_t     * pclient_data,
00126                                                     cache_inode_client_t       * pclient_inode,
00127                                                     hash_table_t               * ht,
00128                                                     fsal_op_context_t          * pcontext,
00129                                                     cache_content_status_t     * pstatus ) 
00130 {
00131   DIR * cache_directory ;
00132   cache_content_dirinfo_t export_directory ;
00133 
00134   char cache_exportdir[MAXPATHLEN] ;
00135   char fullpath[MAXPATHLEN] ;
00136  
00137   struct dirent *  direntp ; 
00138   struct dirent dirent_export ; 
00139 
00140   int       found_export_id ;
00141   u_int64_t inum ;
00142 
00143   off_t size_in_cache ;
00144 
00145   cache_entry_t           inode_entry ;
00146   cache_entry_t         * pentry         = NULL ;
00147   cache_content_entry_t * pentry_content = NULL ;
00148   cache_inode_status_t    cache_inode_status ;
00149   cache_content_status_t  cache_content_status ;
00150  
00151   fsal_attrib_list_t      fsal_attr ;
00152   cache_inode_fsal_data_t fsal_data ;
00153   
00154   *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS ;
00155 
00156   /* Open the cache directory */
00157   if( ( cache_directory = opendir( pclient_data->cache_dir ) ) == NULL )
00158     {
00159       *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_LOCAL_CACHE_ERROR  ;
00160       return *pstatus ;
00161     }
00162   /* read the cache directory */
00163   while( ( direntp = readdir( cache_directory ) ) != NULL )
00164     {
00165 
00166 
00167       /* . and .. are of no interest */
00168       if( !strcmp( direntp->d_name, "." ) || !strcmp( direntp->d_name, ".." ) )
00169         continue ;
00170 
00171       if( ( found_export_id = cache_content_get_export_id( direntp->d_name ) ) >= 0 )
00172         {
00173           DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient_data->log_outputs, NIV_EVENT, 
00174                              "Directory cache for Export ID %d has been found", found_export_id ) ;
00175           snprintf( cache_exportdir, MAXPATHLEN, "%s/%s", pclient_data->cache_dir, direntp->d_name ) ;
00176           
00177           
00178           if( cache_content_local_cache_opendir( cache_exportdir, &(export_directory) ) == FALSE )
00179             {
00180               *pstatus = CACHE_CONTENT_LOCAL_CACHE_ERROR  ;
00181               closedir( cache_directory ) ;
00182               return *pstatus ;
00183             }
00184 
00185           /* Reads the directory content (a single thread for the moment) */
00186             
00187           while( cache_content_local_cache_dir_iter( &export_directory, &dirent_export,index, mod )  )
00188             {
00189               /* . and .. are of no interest */
00190               if( !strcmp( dirent_export.d_name, "." ) || !strcmp( dirent_export.d_name, ".." ) )
00191                 continue ;
00192 
00193               if( ( inum = cache_content_get_inum( dirent_export.d_name ) ) > 0 )
00194                 {
00195                   DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient_data->log_outputs, NIV_EVENT, 
00196                                      "Cache entry for File ID %llx has been found", inum ) ;
00197 
00198                   /* Get the content of the file */
00199                   sprintf( fullpath, "%s/%s/%s", pclient_data->cache_dir, direntp->d_name, dirent_export.d_name ) ;
00200                   
00201                   if( ( cache_inode_status = cache_inode_reload_content( fullpath,
00202                                                                          &inode_entry ) ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00203                     {
00204                       DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient_data->log_outputs, NIV_MAJOR, 
00205                                          "File Content Cache record for File ID %llx is unreadable", inum ) ;
00206                       continue ;
00207                     }
00208                   else
00209                     DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient_data->log_outputs, NIV_MAJOR, 
00210                                        "File Content Cache record for File ID %llx : READ OK", inum ) ;
00211 
00212                   /* Populating the cache_inode... */
00213                   fsal_data.handle = inode_entry.object.file.handle ;
00214                   fsal_data.cookie = 0 ;
00215                   
00216                   if( ( pentry = cache_inode_get( &fsal_data, 
00217                                                   &fsal_attr, 
00218                                                   ht, 
00219                                                   pclient_inode, 
00220                                                   pcontext, 
00221                                                   &cache_inode_status ) ) == NULL )
00222                    {
00223                     DisplayLogJd(  pclient_inode->log_outputs, "Error adding cached inode for file ID %llx, error=%d", 
00224                                    inum, cache_inode_status ) ;
00225                     continue ;
00226                    }
00227                   else
00228                     DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient_inode->log_outputs, NIV_EVENT, 
00229                                        "Cached inode added successfully for file ID %llx", inum ) ;
00230                  
00231                   /* Get the size from the cache */
00232                   if(  ( size_in_cache = cache_content_recover_size( cache_exportdir, inum ) ) == -1 )
00233                     {
00234                         DisplayLogJd(  pclient_inode->log_outputs, "Error when recovering size for file ID %llx", inum )  ;
00235                     }
00236                   else
00237                     pentry->object.file.attributes.filesize = (fsal_size_t)size_in_cache ;
00238 
00239                   /* Adding the cached entry to the data cache */
00240                   if( ( pentry_content = cache_content_new_entry( pentry, 
00241                                                                   NULL,
00242                                                                   pclient_data, 
00243                                                                   RECOVER_ENTRY,
00244                                                                   pcontext,
00245                                                                   &cache_content_status ) ) == NULL )
00246                    {
00247                     DisplayLogJd(  pclient_data->log_outputs, "Error adding cached data for file ID %llx, error=%d", 
00248                                    inum, cache_inode_status ) ;
00249                     continue ;
00250                    }
00251                   else
00252                     DisplayLogJdLevel( pclient_data->log_outputs, NIV_EVENT, 
00253                                        "Cached data added successfully for file ID %llx", inum ) ;
00254 
00255                    
00256                   if( ( cache_content_status = cache_content_valid( pentry_content, CACHE_CONTENT_OP_GET, pclient_data ) )  != CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS )
00257                    {
00258                       *pstatus = cache_content_status ;
00259                       return *pstatus ;
00260                    }
00261 
00262                 }
00263               
00264             } /*  while( ( dirent_export = readdir( export_directory ) ) != NULL ) */
00265           
00266           /* Close the export cache directory */
00267            cache_content_local_cache_closedir( &export_directory ) ;
00268           
00269         } /* if( ( found_export_id = cache_content_get_export_id( direntp->d_name ) ) > 0 ) */
00270     } /* while( ( direntp = readdir( cache_directory ) ) != NULL ) */
00271   
00272   /* Close the cache directory */
00273   closedir( cache_directory ) ;
00274     
00275 
00276   return *pstatus ;
00277 } /* cache_content_crash_recover */
00278
